author: Ror5ch
body:
As requested by STEAM, GEN fragments for ZpEE and ZpMM samples that will be used in release validation (B2G high pt triggers) are added. These are basically updates of the existing ones:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/Configuration/Generator/python/ZpEE_2250_13TeV_TuneCUETP8M1_cfi.py
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/Configuration/Generator/python/ZpMM_2250_13TeV_TuneCUETP8M1_cfi.py
- com 13 TeV -> 14 TeV
- TuneCUETP8M1 -> TuneCP5
- mass 2.25 TeV -> 6 TeV

The fragments are validated in 11_2_X with GT 112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v16:
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/ZpMM_6000_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi.py --python_filename test_1_cfg.py --eventcontent RAWSIM --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring --datatier GEN --fileout file:test1.root --conditions 112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v16  --step GEN --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --no_exec --mc -n 1000
title: Added ZpEE and ZpMM GEN fragments for release validation
